attributes.action: Reform terms limits and abolish government offices
attributes.additional_details: For the Government to reform the terms of that Judges, MP's and Lords and Councillors can sit, which are currently unlimited. For the government to also abolish the Culture Media and Sports Office and devolve Culture to the Performing Arts College, Media to the Home Office and Sports to the Health Department. Finally for the government to abolish the prime ministers other posts and devolve the powers to the post of prime minister, as they are all the same.
